sentences.english: Just put me off the train at Dijon anyway.
sentences.chinese: 總之，只要讓我在第戎下火車就行。

sentences.english: In short" to do good work, must first sharpen his tools."
sentences.chinese: 總之“工欲善其事，必先利其器。

sentences.english: All told, this will not only directly help  families and businesses.
sentences.chinese: 總之，這項計劃不僅僅會直接幫助家庭和企業。

sentences.english: In short, maternal instinct is wonderful, but it has its limits.
sentences.chinese: 總之，母性本能是美好的，但它有其侷限性。

sentences.english: Either way, it’s really destructive to talk only about the dangers of sex.
sentences.chinese: 總之只跟孩子談性的危險是極具破壞性的。

sentences.english: After all, I got a not-bad result.
sentences.chinese: 總之，我有一個不算壞的結果。

sentences.english: Anyway, I promise you I'll try to focus on study from now on.
sentences.chinese: 總之我答應你，以後會好好學習。

sentences.english: In total, the first era of One Piece stretches to 516 episodes.
sentences.chinese: 總之，《海賊王》的第一個時代一直到第516集。

sentences.english: In other words, avoid the left side of the entire hole.
sentences.chinese: 總之，你應該儘量避開洞的整個左側區域。

sentences.english: To sum up all, uprisings have been disastrous.
sentences.chinese: 總之，暴動是件禍國殃民的事。

sentences.english: All told, there were seven major revisions.
sentences.chinese: 總之，一共有七次重大修改。

sentences.english: Anyway-ill believe it when ill see it.
sentences.chinese: 總之我不見到是不相信的。

sentences.english: Obviously he was a controversial historical figure.
sentences.chinese: 總之，馮道是個頗有爭議的歷史人物。

sentences.english: The right person is still gonna think the sun shines out of your ass.
sentences.chinese: 總之對路的人會覺得你放的屁都是香的。

sentences.english: Above all, we need to bring bottom-line value for the client.
sentences.chinese: 總之，我們需要將真正的價值帶給我們的客戶。

sentences.english: In a word, during using the diathermanous inductor, it must be observed as well as checked.
sentences.chinese: 總之，透熱感應器在使用過程中還必須邊觀察邊檢查。

definition: only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
